mapper.sql: id, project_id, is_root, memo, query_threshold, username, password, verify_code, cluster, is_active, search_type, ip, data_center, index_exp, create_time, update_time, is_default_display
mapper.select:
select
from arius_es_user where is_active = 1 and is_default_display=1 and project_id=#{projectId} limit 1
select count(id) from arius_es_user where is_active = 1 and is_default_display = 1 and project_id = #{projectId}
mapper.insert: insert into arius_es_user ( is_root, memo, query_threshold, username, password, verify_code, cluster, search_type, data_center, project_id, is_default_display) values ( #{isRoot}, #{memo}, #{queryThreshold}, #{username}, #{password}, #{verifyCode}, #{cluster}, #{searchType}, #{dataCenter}, #{projectId}, #{defaultDisplay})
mapper.select:
select
from arius_es_user where is_active = 1 and id = #{esUser}

select
from arius_es_user where is_active = 1 and project_id = #{projectId}
select count(project_id) from arius_es_user where is_active = 1 and project_id = #{projectId}
select distinct project_id from arius_es_user where search_type = #{searchType} and is_active = 1
